creditline: Gift of Leo and Doris Hodroff
description: painted with portrait of young Queen Victoria within laurel wreath above "1837" in iron-red and gilt cartouche; body has scattered floral sprays
object_name: Bottle vase with portrait of Queen Victoria
text: Having ascended to the British throne in 1837, Queen Victoria celebrated her Diamond Jubilee (60th anniversary) in 1897.  The occasion was not overlooked by the manufacturers of Chinese Export porcelain, even in the waning days of its manufacture.
title: Bottle vase with portrait of Queen Victoria
